law.text: The board shall, after denying an application for a license, if petitioned by the applicant within fifteen (15) days of notification, or before suspending or revoking any license, set the matter down for a hearing to be conducted in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 177, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 114, sec. 55, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 315, sec. 35. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 252, sec. 11.
